Trade/Device Name(s): JBAIDS Influenza A & B Detection Kit
Submitter Information: U.S. Army Medical Materiel Development Activity
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Reverse transcriptase real-time polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for JBAIDS Influenza A & B Detection Kit using rRT-PCR for qualitative detection of Influenza A and B viral RNA from nasopharyngeal specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro qualitative detection of Influenza A and Influenza B viral nucleic acids isolated from nasopharyngeal swab and wash specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, to be used with JBAIDS instruments in designated DoD laboratories
